entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 7 April 2023
